title: VK API JSON Schema
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API objects and methods

methods.name: pages.clearCache
methods.description: Allows to clear the cache of particular 'external' pages which may be attached to VK posts.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Address of the page where you need to refesh the cached version

methods.name: pages.get
methods.description: Returns information about a wiki page.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Page owner ID.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: Wiki page ID.

parameters.name: global
parameters.description: '1' — to return information about a global wiki page

parameters.name: site_preview
parameters.description: '1' — resulting wiki page is a preview for the attached link

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Wiki page title.

parameters.name: need_html
parameters.description: '1' — to return the page as HTML,

methods.name: pages.getHistory
methods.description: Returns a list of all previous versions of a wiki page.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: Wiki page ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the wiki page.

methods.name: pages.getTitles
methods.description: Returns a list of wiki pages in a group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the wiki page.

methods.name: pages.getVersion
methods.description: Returns the text of one of the previous versions of a wiki page.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the wiki page.

parameters.name: need_html
parameters.description: '1' — to return the page as HTML

methods.name: pages.parseWiki
methods.description: Returns HTML representation of the wiki markup.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text of the wiki page.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the group in the context of which this markup is interpreted.

methods.name: pages.save
methods.description: Saves the text of a wiki page.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text of the wiki page in wiki-format.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: Wiki page ID. The 'title' parameter can be passed instead of 'pid'.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the wiki page.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Wiki page title.

methods.name: pages.saveAccess
methods.description: Saves modified read and edit access settings for a wiki page.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: Wiki page ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the wiki page.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Who can view the wiki page: '1' — only community members, '2' — all users can view the page, '0' — only community managers

parameters.name: edit
parameters.description: Who can edit the wiki page: '1' — only community members, '2' — all users can edit the page, '0' — only community managers
